revised_title: Observations on the Damage Caused by Winter to Gardens and Plants
tldr: The author, John Evelyn, describes the damage done to his gardens and plants during a severe winter. He provides a detailed account of the impact on various species of trees, shrubs, and plants, and offers advice on how to care for them during harsh weather conditions. The author also discusses the resilience of certain plants and the importance of proper gardening techniques to ensure their survival.
